Nationalists are active in the province, stirring up trouble with random acts of violence. If left unchecked, they may rise in rebellion against us.
Foreign patriots have taken control of the province.
Mecca is the center of all Islam. To hold it is to stand above all others, and prove to them that the fate of all Islam lies in our hands.
column6: La Meca es el centro de todo el Islam. Mantenerla es estar por encima de todos los demás, y demostrarles que el destino de todo el Islam está en nuestras manos.

column2: The renowned Sikh fighting style, it is a martial art involving sword play ...and has made the Sikhs into fearsome combatants.
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police was formed to patrol the newly-acquired North-West Territories, eventually uniting with the Dominion Police to keep order throughout all Canadian provinces.
column6: La Real Policía Montada de Canadá se formó para patrullar los recién adquiridos Territorios del Noroeste, y finalmente se unió a la Policía del Dominio para mantener el orden en todas las provincias canadienses.

column2: The province is not being integrated into the rest of the country, and being allowed to maintain its separate identity.
column6: La provincia no se integra en el resto del país y se le permite mantener su identidad separada.

column2: The province is being integrated into the rest of the country, a slow process that may cause problems here.
column6: La provincia se está integrando en el resto del país, un proceso lento que puede causar problemas aquí.

column2: There has been a great deal of change in our country. It will take some time to sort things out, before business as usual can resume.
The province has just switched its major production, and locals are still acclimatizing to the change.
We are a pariah in the international community for our aggressive policies.
column6: Somos un paria en la comunidad internacional por nuestras políticas agresivas.

column2: Many immigrants from around the world will pass through our great harbor, and a great number of them will remain in the city.
